oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hukum Mŭm-bhagi pusaka : manuscript, 1832
Kitāb al-faraʼiḍ
Law of dividing hereditary property
Kitab pusaka
Syair sindiran badan
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: American Board of Commissioners for Foreign Missions (former owner.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the colophons (ff. 15r and 25r), copy completed on 22 Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1247 AH [April 22, 1832 AD] or on 25 Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1247 AH [April 25, 1832 AD].
Writen in one column, 12 lines per page, in black and red.
With: an untitled text beginning Ini naskhanya yang dari Betawi (ff. 15r-25r) ; Syair sindiran badan (ff. 30r-50v).
Title from f. 2r. It is written in Roman letters by a later hand.
MS Indo 13 (leaves f 4v-25r). Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In Malay in the Jawi-Arabic script.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islamic law--Malaysia
Inheritance and succession (Islamic law)
